QuestData.Title: Ending the Threat
QuestData.Description: Their leader and his guard are before us. My Sentinels are ready to take care of his guard, we only awaited this arrow to seal their leader's fate.$B$BLet me know when you are prepared to attack. As soon as my Sentinels engage, I will shatter the leader's shield, and we will assault him together. Strike swiftly and we can rout this threat to our lands here and now.$B$BWe await only you - speak to me when ready.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The days of peace with the Shatterspear have passed, and so the Shatterspear must pass as well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Sandrya Moonfall to start the attack, and aid her in killing Jor'kil the Soulripper.
QuestData.RewardText: We owe a great debt to you for all that you've done to see this battle through.$B$BNot often can we claim victories so decisively, but it seems there's far more to this plot than just the Shatterspear. If you haven't already checked his body for information, make sure to do so before you leave.
